summary: Manu comes to India to find a bride for himself and falls for Tanu at first sight but Tanu, a free spirited girl has no plans of marrying him.
cast: Madhavan|Kangana Ranaut|Jimmy Sheirgill|Deepak Dobriyal|Swara Bhaskar|Eijaz Khan|K.K. Raina|Rajendra Gupta|Navni Parihar|Dipti Misra|Rahul Chahan|Shveta Grover|Ravi Kishan|Sunil Upadhyay
director: Director: Aanand L. Rai (as Anand Rai)
title: Tanu Weds Manu
